#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
unsigned long long int mem[25]={0};
unsigned long long int tom(unsigned long long int n)
{ if(n==1)
 return 0;
 if(n==2)
 return 1;
 if(mem[n]>0)
 {  return mem[n];}
  else
  { unsigned long long int ans=tom(n-1)*(n-1)+tom(n-2)*(n-2);
    mem[n]=ans; 
    return ans;
 }
}
int main()
{ int t,mod;
 cin>>t;
 while(t--)
 { unsigned long long int y,n,k,count=0,x,dig,c=0,temp;
  cin>>k>>n; int k1=k;
  if(k<=9)
        mod=10;
        else if(k<100)
        mod=100;
        else
        mod=1000;
  //while(k1)  { k1=k1/10;   c++; }
 x=tom(n); 
 if(k==0 && n==1)
  { cout<<1<<endl; continue; }
    while(x)
 {  dig=x%mod;
    if(k==dig)
    count++;  
    x/=10;
 }
cout<<count<<endl;
}
}
